CustomField.description: What is the API name of the field that you will add the results of your SOQL to on the inserted record. This will typically be the lookup field that creates the relationship between your record and the parent record.(Case to Account, for example).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the API name of the field that you will add the results of your SOQL to on the inserted record. This will typically be the lookup field that creates the relationship between your record and the parent record.(Case to Account, for example).
CustomField.label: Field to Update
